title: [1508521049] Smoky Pork Sliders with BBQ Sauce - Gordon Ramsay
description:
Sliders are a great snack for a celebration or an easy family dinner. This recipe uses pork mince - which has the perfect fat content for a juicy burger, and a sweet and smoky BBQ sauce. Fantastic. 

Subscribe for weekly recipe videos. 

If you liked this clip check out the rest of Gordon's channels: 

http://www.youtube.com/gordonramsay
http://www.youtube.com/kitchennightmares
http://www.youtube.com/thefword
